attributes.action: Force all major food production companies to use biodegradable packaging.
attributes.additional_details: 80% of supermarkets have already signed up to reducing their use of single-use plastics. the supermarket industry is one of the biggest users of plastics in the UK and an Act prohibiting single-use plastic's would be a step in the right direction.
attributes.background: After the recent report on global warming, it is clear that the government must act now to stop the overproduction of plastics in the food industry. Companies such as Graze have already been doing this for some years, showing there are easy and cheap alternatives.

rejection.details:
We are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. In particular we are not sure whether you would like to ban the use of plastics by food production companies or their sale in supermarkets.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229720
